de.hlu.ust
Class Account

java.lang.Object
  de.hlu.ust.Finance
      de.hlu.ust.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable
public class Account
extends Finance
implements java.lang.Comparable

The Account object stores all information about an ust account. An Account collects bookings of the same type, e.g. all outgoings for stamps. It differs from the BankAccountwhich makes an entry for a bank.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getKind

public int getKind()
Getter for the accounts type. The type is importend for the VAT calculation. Possible types are:
    • Finance.IN
      Finance.OUT
      Finance.NEUTRAL
      Finance.PREVAT
      Finance.IN_CASH_BOX
      Finance.OUT_CASH_BOX

    • Returns:
    This accounts type.
    See Also:
    setKind(int)

    public boolean getHasBankStatement()
    Getter of the accounts flag about the bank statement.

    Returns:
    true if bookings of this account have usually an bank statement.
    See Also:

    create

    public void create()
            throws AppException
    Add the account to the list of accounts. Make the new account persistence, save the file as .old, set the id, append *this and write all accounts.

    Throws:
    AppException - If the account number exists already or some read or write problems.

    remove

    public void remove()
            throws AppException
    Remove the account entry.

    Throws:
    AppException - If the accounts internal id isn't found or in case of read or write problems.

    update

    public void update(int number,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   int kind,
                   boolean hasBankStatement,
                   double vat,
                   java.lang.String user)
            throws AppException
    Actualize the given account by the internal id and persist the change. The date field is set to the actual date and time.

    Parameters:
    number - accounts new number.
    name - accounts new name.
    description - accounts new description.
    kind - accounts new type.
    hasBankStatement - accounts new idea about bookings of this account have usually an bank entry.
    vat - accounts default for the VAT that have bookings of this account.
    user - changing users name.
    Throws:
    AppException - If no account with the given internal id is found or in case of read or write problems.

                                  throws AppException

    Returns:
